Posted By: Mr.Wimples (8/8/2011 8:45:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Decent sideboard removal, albeit conditional...that said sorcery hurts this alot, but other 1 cost removal is either very conditional or has potentially severe drawbacks ([Vendetta](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vendetta) or [Slaughter Pact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slaughter Pact)) although personally I prefer [Ghastly Demise](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghastly Demise) since black has a pretty easy job of keeping it's graveyard full, and it's an instant. Also non-black can hit {R}{W}{U}{G}, whereas [Deathmark](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deathmark) can only hit {G}{W}
posts.html:
Decent sideboard removal, albeit conditional...that said sorcery hurts this alot, but other 1 cost removal is either very conditional or has potentially severe drawbacks (Vendetta or Slaughter Pact) although personally I prefer Ghastly Demise since black has a pretty easy job of keeping it's graveyard full, and it's an instant. Also non-black can hit {R}{W}{U}{G}, whereas Deathmark can only hit {G}{W}
